snippet: A lack of flexibility and a slow check-in process contribute to a migration away from the cultural center during New York Fashion Week.
abstract: Lincoln Center, initially hailed as new and more polished home to New York Fashion Week, has lost its luster for some, leading to nostalgia for former Bryant Park location.
lead_paragraph: A lack of flexibility and a slow check-in process contribute to a migration away from the cultural center during New York Fashion Week.

headline.seo: Lincoln Center Falling Out of Favor With New York Fashion Week Presenters
headline.main: Lincoln Center Loses a Bit of Luster
headline.print_headline: Lincoln Center Loses a Bit of Luster
